concept.title: 1832.1110 Solicitation provision and contract clauses. (NASA supplements paragraphs (a), (b), and (c)).

conbody.p: (b) In accordance with FAR 32.1106(b), the use of a nondomestic EFT mechanism is authorized. When a nondomestic EFT mechanism is used, the contracting officer shall replace the paragraph at FAR 52.232-34(c) with a description of the EFT mechanism that will be used for the contract.
